section.section:
Within 5 days after the change, a licensee shall submit to the Secretary written notice of:
the addition of a branch office; and
any change in the address of an existing office.

The licensee shall submit with the notice:
the agency license certificate; and
if the proposed change affects an existing branch office, the branch office certificate for that office.

The Secretary may:
endorse the change on the agency license certificate and, if applicable, on the branch office certificate of the affected branch office; or
issue a new agency license certificate and, if applicable, a new branch office certificate, both of which shall set forth the same date as the original agency license certificate.

text.section:
Within 5 days after the occurrence, a firm shall submit to the Secretary written notice of:
the withdrawal of any firm member; and
the death of any firm member.
